de.uni_muenster.wi.md2library.view.management.implementation

Class Md2ViewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_muenster.wi.md2library.view.management.implementation.Md2ViewManager

  • public class Md2ViewManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Md2ViewManager is used to manage activities. It is used to navigate between views and provides access to widgets of the currently started activity.

    Created on 10/08/2015

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fabian Wrede

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Md2ViewManager getInstance()
        Gets instance of the Md2ViewManager. Implemented as singleton.
        Returns:
        the instance

      • goTo

        public void goTo(java.lang.String viewName)
        Go to specified view, i.e., start respective activity.
        Parameters:
        viewName - the fully qualified name of the activity that should be started

      • getActiveView

        public Activity getActiveView()
        Gets active view.
        Returns:
        the active view

      • setActiveView

        public void setActiveView(Activity activeView)
        Sets active view.
        Parameters:
        activeView - the active view

      • getWidget

        public Md2Widget getWidget(int widgetId)
        Gets widget. If the widget belongs to the currently started activity, it is returned directly. Otherwise, the method tries to get the widget from the Md2WidgetRegistry. If the widget has not been created yet, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        widgetId - the widgetId
        Returns:
        the widget

      • getWidgetValue

        public Md2Type getWidgetValue(int widgetId)
        Gets widget value. If the widget is not contained in the currently started activity, the method tries to return the value from the widget stored in the widget registry.
        Parameters:
        widgetId - the widget id
        Returns:
        the widget value
